text: Q & A is a 1990 American British crime drama movie directed by Sidney Lumet and was based on the novel by Edwin Torres. It stars Nick Nolte, Armand Assante, Timothy Hutton, Jenny Lumet, Patrick O'Neal, Lee Richardson, Charles S. Dutton, Fyvush Finkel and was distributed by Tri-Star Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1990 crime drama movies Category:1990s LGBT movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:British crime drama movies Category:British LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney Lumet Category:Movies about police misconduct Category:Movies set in Miami Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Puerto Rico
title: Q & A (movie)
